thread.title: Lewes Little League set to remodel field house
thread.title_full: Lewes Little League set to remodel field house

author: newsroom@capegazette.com (Steven Billups)
title: Lewes Little League set to remodel field house
text:
Lewes Little League set to remodel field house By Steven Billups | Oct 10, 2015 Photo by: Steven Billups Kicking off the project with bats, not shovels are (l-r) David Hart, Mike Ciabattoni, Christian Hudson, Theo Hart, Jim Baker and Lewes Mayor Ted Becker. 
Lewes Little League officials broke out their bats instead of shovels to break down the old field house Sept. 29. The field house will be remodeled, keeping the existing brick foundation, with improvements to the snack shack downstairs, a new meeting room and handicap accessible restrooms. Improvements to the infrastructure of the park and fields will also be undertaken. 
Contributions from the community, businesses and contractors along with donations of labor and materials are helping with the funds, but donations are still being accepted. The completion date is targeted for early April. To get more information go to www.leweslittleleague.com .
